token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['create_time_start']="2017-01-13 00:00:00"
params['page_size']=5
params['page_no']=1
params['retail_source']="RENWOXING"
params['spu_codes']="["BM961767374"]"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.spu.query', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
